title: "University of California, Los Angeles: With $7M grant from NIH, UCLA scientists to study if brain stimulation during sleep can bolster memory"
excerpt: "Sleep plays an important role in how the brain consolidates short-term memories from the previous day into enduring ones. But exactly how that process occurs remains a mystery. A new study led by UCLA scientists could help answer that question."
